GVRWidget - Class in org.gearvrf.widgetplugin
GVRWidget is a wrapper for LibGDX widget.
GVRWidget() - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidget
 
GVRWidgetInputDispatcher - Class in org.gearvrf.widgetplugin
GVRWidgetInputDispatcher is internal class responsible for dispatching input events to GVRWidgetSceneObjects
GVRWidgetInputDispatcher() - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetInputDispatcher
 
GVRWidgetPlugin - Class in org.gearvrf.widgetplugin
This provides GVR (libGDX) widget lifecycle and context management and brings it together with GVR activity context.
GVRWidgetPlugin(GVRActivity) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
GVRWidgetSceneObject - Class in org.gearvrf.widgetplugin
GVRWidgetSceneObject shows the GVRwidget widgets are created from LibGDX GlSurfaceView which is created by app as follows
GVRWidgetSceneObject(GVRContext, GVRMesh, int) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObject
Shows GVRF UI widgets (Libgdx scene2d) scene object
GVRWidgetSceneObject(GVRContext, int, GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo, int, int) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObject
Shows GVRF UI widgets (Libgdx scene2d) scene object
GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo - Class in org.gearvrf.widgetplugin
GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo provides way to create GVRWidgetSceneObject meshes quickly.
GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo(float, float, float, float, int[], int[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo

mTopLeftViewCoords - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo
Following two variables correspond to top left and bottom right X and Y screen coordinates of parent libGDX GLSurfaceView which the app created from which our GVRWidgetSceneObjects are created, kindly refer @GVRWidgetSceneObject for more info on how these scene objects are created from the view
mTopLeftX - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo
Following four variables correspond to top left and bottom right X and Y world coordinates of GVRWidgetSceneObject, creating a rectangle
mTopLeftY - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo
 
mUseImmersiveMode - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
mViewHeight - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
mViewWidth - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
mWidget - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
mWidgetView - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetPlugin
 
mZ - Variable in class org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo
Z is constant for easy mesh creation, app can transform widget after creation to play with it.
